channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Paramount launches hostile bid for Warner Bros. with $108.4 billion offer, besting Netflix by $25 billion
item.description: Paramount Skydance CEO David Ellison is not ready to go down without a fight for Warner Bros. Discovery, making a counter offer that is $18 billion mo...

item.title: Intel, Adobe and these other ‘AI loser’ stocks could get left behind in the next phase of the tech boom
item.description: These 12 tech companies are most vulnerable to having their business models upended by the AI revolution, according to Wedbush Securities.

item.title: Your estate plan needs to be absolutely airtight. Here’s how to avoid mistakes.
item.description: If you don’t understand something in a document, don’t sign it.

item.title: How Nvidia’s stock can benefit from this emerging trend in AI models
item.description: As the industry shifts toward AI models with better memory and understanding, Citi expects a new Nvidia offering to best its competitors.

item.title: Why this veteran strategist is dropping his preference for tech stocks after 15 years
item.description: More competition is coming for the “juicy profit margins” of the “Magnificent Seven,” Ed Yardeni said, and he’s ready to look elsewhere for gains.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
